patthana16.88:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.88:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro
patthana16.88:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.88:2.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanakāmāvacaro ca
patthana16.88:2.1_3: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… ārammaṇe
